title: SPY presents "My Dreams, Not Yours" | Part 2
description:
After spending 10 years with the US Ski Team, SPY skier Dylan Ferguson has decided to go his own way and chase his own dreams. He now finds happiness in skiing with his friends and a camera rather than in front of judges and crowds. 

Learn more about Dyl
